ygData.subject: RE: Crafted items (some idiot)
ygData.msgSnippet: Ivory Braclets come off the Unrest Reanimated Hand.
ygData.messageBody:
Ivory Braclets come off the Unrest Reanimated Hand.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Doug Sorensen [SMTP:belgarth_of_surefall@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, September 01, 1999 4:01 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Crafted items (some idiot)
>
> From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
>
> Thanks for the clarification. I thought the Evil Eyes
> had Ivory Bracelets.
>
> --- Jason Harrell <jharrell@...> wrote:
> > From: "Jason Harrell" <jharrell@...>
> >
> > Polished Bone Hoops come from the Evil Eyes in East
> > Karana and the Gorge,
> > like the Polished Bone Bracers. Rare drops though
> > (pain in the butt to camp,
> > like everything else). If you're high enough in
> > level, you can easily camp
> > the Altar in the gorge for the Lords. It's rumored
> > that they drop more often
> > there.
> >
> > Hope that helps.
>
